testemonials.name: Barbara Fifield
testemonials.quote: I recently had a visit with Mario Diaz, of your company, to help me with my computer which I had been having problems with since I installed Windows 10, and I was very impressed with this young man's demeanor, expertise , skill and personality. Mario helped me a great deal and I would refer him to anyone who asked. I am a senior citizen in a retirement home, living on a fixed income, and he was most generous and I think he should have charged me more, but, again, he was very kind. We need more people in the world like Mario. Thank you so much!

business.header-text: Professional computer repair and network support at your Spokane business or home office.

servicepair.description: Virus removal and malware prevention. We thoroughly clean your computers and network of malicious software that could harm your pc's and/or business.
Slow computer's are often caused by junk we pick up everyday while we use them, Spokane Techs will clean out the clutter on your PC so that it can run to its full potential again.
We recover data from laptop and desktop hard drives. If your computer is no longer working we can often recovery your data and move it to another working computer.
We offer network storage solutions such as NAS / Servers / Cloud setups for easy file access between all of your employees.
We offer hardware upgrades to speed up your current pc as well as replacement computers if need be.
We will install your needed hardware such as switches, firewalls, wireless access points, and cables
We install and configure new printers for your business network or desktop PC.
OS installations Linux / Windows. Mac offered off site.
We are able to clone your hard drive data to a new drive if you are looking to upgrade or change your hard drive
We offer top of the line custom built computers for aggressive prices. Have a quick and responsive PC for all of your office needs.
We offer quick and accurate diagnosis of your computer if it is not working correctly.
